1.2.name: wordpress/mlb-fantasy-news-widget
1.2.description:
If your blog covers anything having to do with MLB baseball, Your readers will find this widget very useful. We're aggregating the top fantasy baseball sites in the United states.

Install this widget and it will be updated in the future with additional data including live scores, and player rankings. We're also writing updates so you will be able to easily edit the skins.
